author: Laura Hogan
title: Testing under way in residential care units
description: All residents and staff of long term residential care units are to be tested for Covid-19 over the next seven to ten days, as part of an effort to tackle the spread of the virus in these settings.
content:
All residents and staff in long term residential care units are to be tested for Covid-19 over the next seven to ten days, as part of an effort to tackle the spread of the virus in these settings.
